column4: i i have download a program.tar.gz, i have tar -xvzf  program.tar.gz cd file , ./configure,make, make install, everything ok , now i want to remove the program , wath i have to do?
only deleting the folder is ok?
you'll need to check the documentation of the program but returning to source directory "sudo make uninstall" *might* work
in future you should use checkinstall to install source programs - then there is a clean uninstall method
